fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
PERSONAL INFORMATION: 
 Full Name         
: LUONG VINH THAO. 
 Date of birth  
: 23/11/1989. 
 Gender               
: Male.  
 Status  
: Single. 
 Address 
: 51 Street 13,Hiep Binh Phuoc, Thu Đuc District, HCM 
City. 
 Phone  
:  
 Email  
:  
EDUCATION BACKGROUND: 
2012 - 2014 
Université Pierre et Marie Curie–Paris 6, France. 
(French Universities Program - Vietnam National University 
HCMC) 
Master of Information Technology - Major: Computer Network 
2007 - 2012 
University of Information Technology, Vietnam National University 
HCM City. 
Bachelor of Network and Communication. 
WORKING EXPERIENCES: 
2018 -Now  
System Engineer at Linkbynet VietNam. 
 Level 2 escalation on the incident, problem management on the 
linux system.  
 Pre-sale support on cloud (alibabacloud) . 
 Handle the task and dispatch to the team member as technical 
leader. 
 Provide capacity report and incident report analysis for customer. 
 Technical support project manager for client project. 
 Training the L1 team on the cloud (AWS , Alibabacloud), incident 
process. 
 Automation code for IaaS (ansible, terraform, git). 
2016-2017 
System Admin at Linkbynet VietNam 
 Deployment servers on cloud AWS, Alicloud for global customer. 
 Deployment hybris, magento, symphony and provide automation 
script deployment for our client. 
 Onsite support at Singapore for some project. 
11/2015- 2/2016 
System Admin at Linkbynet Canada 
 Provide a training to Montreal technical team about Alibabacloud. 
 Support the customer at Montreal. 
2014–2015  
System Admin at Linkbynet VietNam. 
 Handle our client incident following the ITIL process (around 
2000 linux servers). 
 Install, configure and maintain systems and applications. 
 Understand our customer demand and provide a solution based on 
their demand. 
 Migration our client server to cloud(Alibaba cloud). 
CERTIFICATION: 
Cloud 
ACP (Alibaba Cloud Certified Profession). 
SKILLs: 
OS 
Microsoft Windows Server, Linux(centos ,redhat, ubuntu) 
Programing 
bash shell, python 
Networking 
TCP/IP,LAN/WAN , Troubleshooting 
Internet  Protocol 
HTTPS, HTTP, DNS ,SSL/TLS 
System 
Log management, Zabbix, Cloud (AWS,Alicloud,Azure), java 
troubleshooting, git, docker, terraform, ansible  
Web  
Apache ,Nginx, Varnish, CDN (Akamai, cloud front) 
Application 
Magento, Hybris, PHP, 
Database 
MySQL, Oracle, Redis, Cloud RDS 
English  Intermediate. 
AWARDS :  
2017 
Linkbynet best performance reward 
2014 
DTS Scholarship for program ”DTS young talent”, DTS Telecom. 
2013 
PUF Scholarship. 
FURTHER DETAILS: 
Activities,  
Character 
Swimming, volleyball, football, ping pong table.  
Travel and learn new technology. 
Solving the problem and be active. 
Personal  Skills 
The ability to work with group. 
Self-organized , proactive and  prioritize works 
Mindset to provide the good service for client. 
Ability to learn and adapt rapidly to changing of work 
Leadership skill for technical lead.  
Document and analyzing the document.
